name: Too Hot to Handle (j0hnw1nn1ng)
description: Created the first build, and went to revise because the only quit button that worked was in the pause menu in the tutorial, and the project became corrupted. It's currently 4:36, this is due at 8 and I have class at 10, so if you want to quit the game you can use ALT F4 or navigate to the tutorial and access the pause menu, Thanks!
